casebody.data:
No. 09-10683. George A. DaCosta, Petitioner v. Union Local 306 of the Motion Picture Projectionists, Operators, Video Technicians, Theatrical Employees & Allied Crafts, et al. 562 U.S. 1086, 131 S. Ct. 689, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9198.

178 L. Ed. 2d 519,

November 29, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 849, 131 S. Ct. 98, 178 L. Ed. 2d 61, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 6221.
